name: Sustain4ward
desc: A chrome extension to provide key information about carbon footprint caused by product in current webpage and suggest greener alternatives.

name: CodeCare
tagline: There can be life after cancer, the only prerequisite is early detection.
desc: A deep learning model that is trained from datasets from the cancer imaging archive. Then make a UI for doctors to interact with model and utilise it to save their time and get classification and severity of tumour if present faster and hence act faster
